mojo.description: Set the password of the specified CM User.

parameter.name: jdbcConnectionPoolMaxIdle
parameter.description: Maximum number of idle connections permitted in the connection pool, or negative for no limit. Set this property and jdbcConnectionPoolMinIdle to 0 to prohibit idle connections.

parameter.name: jdbcConnectionPoolMinIdle
parameter.description: Minimum number of idle connections permitted in the connection pool. Set this property and jdbcConnectionPoolMaxIdle to 0 to prohibit idle connections.

parameter.name: password
parameter.description: New plaintext password for the CM user.

mojo.description:
Display help information on ep-core-tool.
Call 
  mvn ep-core-tool:help -Ddetail=true -Dgoal=<goal-name>
to display parameter details.

parameter.name: detail
parameter.description: If true, display all settable properties for each goal.

parameter.name: goal
parameter.description: The name of the goal for which to show help. If unspecified, all goals will be displayed.

parameter.name: indentSize
parameter.description: The number of spaces per indentation level, should be positive.

parameter.name: lineLength
parameter.description: The maximum length of a display line, should be positive.

parameter.name: jdbcConnectionPoolMaxIdle
parameter.description: Maximum number of idle connections permitted in the connection pool, or negative for no limit. Set this property and jdbcConnectionPoolMinIdle to 0 to prohibit idle connections.

parameter.name: jdbcConnectionPoolMinIdle
parameter.description: Minimum number of idle connections permitted in the connection pool. Set this property and jdbcConnectionPoolMaxIdle to 0 to prohibit idle connections.

mojo.description: Updates the setting value in the Elastic Path database. If a value already exists, it will be removed.

parameter.name: jdbcConnectionPoolMaxIdle
parameter.description: Maximum number of idle connections permitted in the connection pool, or negative for no limit. Set this property and jdbcConnectionPoolMinIdle to 0 to prohibit idle connections.

parameter.name: jdbcConnectionPoolMinIdle
parameter.description: Minimum number of idle connections permitted in the connection pool. Set this property and jdbcConnectionPoolMaxIdle to 0 to prohibit idle connections.

parameter.name: settingContext
parameter.description: Context for the setting (eg, store code).

mojo.description: Adds a rebuild request to the index notification queue.

parameter.name: jdbcConnectionPoolMaxIdle
parameter.description: Maximum number of idle connections permitted in the connection pool, or negative for no limit. Set this property and jdbcConnectionPoolMinIdle to 0 to prohibit idle connections.

parameter.name: jdbcConnectionPoolMinIdle
parameter.description: Minimum number of idle connections permitted in the connection pool. Set this property and jdbcConnectionPoolMaxIdle to 0 to prohibit idle connections.

parameter.name: wait
parameter.description: Should execution continue until the requested indexes have been rebuild?

mojo.description: Display the current search server index rebuild status.

parameter.name: jdbcConnectionPoolMaxIdle
parameter.description: Maximum number of idle connections permitted in the connection pool, or negative for no limit. Set this property and jdbcConnectionPoolMinIdle to 0 to prohibit idle connections.

parameter.name: jdbcConnectionPoolMinIdle
parameter.description: Minimum number of idle connections permitted in the connection pool. Set this property and jdbcConnectionPoolMaxIdle to 0 to prohibit idle connections.

mojo.description: Updates the setting value in the Elastic Path database. If a value already exists, it will be removed before being re-added.

parameter.name: jdbcConnectionPoolMaxIdle
parameter.description: Maximum number of idle connections permitted in the connection pool, or negative for no limit. Set this property and jdbcConnectionPoolMinIdle to 0 to prohibit idle connections.

parameter.name: jdbcConnectionPoolMinIdle
parameter.description: Minimum number of idle connections permitted in the connection pool. Set this property and jdbcConnectionPoolMaxIdle to 0 to prohibit idle connections.

mojo.description: Interact with the search server, optionally checking different queries or polling for it to be fully functioning.

parameter.description: Maximum number of idle connections permitted in the connection pool, or negative for no limit. Set this property and jdbcConnectionPoolMinIdle to 0 to prohibit idle connections.

parameter.name: jdbcConnectionPoolMinIdle
parameter.description: Minimum number of idle connections permitted in the connection pool. Set this property and jdbcConnectionPoolMaxIdle to 0 to prohibit idle connections.

mojo.description: Updates the setting value in the Elastic Path database. If a value already exists, it will be removed.

parameter.description: Maximum number of idle connections permitted in the connection pool, or negative for no limit. Set this property and jdbcConnectionPoolMinIdle to 0 to prohibit idle connections.
